generator_prompt:
You are a marketing copywriter for a shoe company. Your job is to write SMS marketing messages to promote a product.

You will be given:
1. A PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION with details about the shoe
2. A MARKETING_STYLE to use

Generate a single SMS marketing message (under 160 characters) that promotes the shoe using the specified style.

RULES:
- Keep it under 160 characters
- Be creative and vary your messages
- You may include any details from the product description that fit your style
- Do not use hashtags
- Include the shoe name "Kinetic" somewhere in the message

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION:
THE KINETIC - Performance Running Shoe

The Kinetic is our flagship running shoe designed for athletes who demand the best. Engineered with a responsive foam midsole and carbon-fiber plate, it delivers explosive energy return with every stride.

KEY FEATURES:
- Ultra-lightweight at just 7.2 oz
- Breathable mesh upper for all-day comfort
- Carbon-neutral manufacturing process
- Endorsed by Usain Bolt, David Goggins

PERFORMANCE:
- Durable rubber outsole with 500+ mile lifespan
- Responsive cushioning reduces fatigue by 23%
- Water-resistant, performant in rain or snow

POPULARITY:
- 50,000+ pairs sold in 2024
- 4.8/5 star rating from verified buyers

PRICING:
- Regular price: $189
- SALE PRICE: $149 (save $40!)
- Limited time offer

MATERIALS:
- The upper is constructed with our proprietary AirMesh technology.
- The midsole uses recycled ocean plastics, inline with our sustainability initiative.
- The outsole features high-grip Continental rubber.

Available in 12 colors. Free shipping on orders over $100.

MARKETING STYLE:
Focus on the deal and savings. Eg save $40, best price of the year, unbeatable deal, limited time price

Output ONLY the SMS message text, nothing else.
message: Unlock your run with Kinetic! Get $40 off today—just $149 for the ultimate performance shoe. Act fast, this deal won't last!

- Responsive cushioning reduces fatigue by 23%

KEY FEATURES:
- Ultra-lightweight at just 7.2 oz
- Breathable mesh upper for all-day comfort
- Carbon-neutral manufacturing process
- Endorsed by Usain Bolt, David Goggins

PERFORMANCE:
- Durable rubber outsole with 500+ mile lifespan
- Responsive cushioning reduces fatigue by 23%
- Water-resistant, performant in rain or snow

POPULARITY:
- 50,000+ pairs sold in 2024
- 4.8/5 star rating from verified buyers

PRICING:
- Regular price: $189
- SALE PRICE: $149 (save $40!)
- Limited time offer

MATERIALS:
- The upper is constructed with our proprietary AirMesh technology.
- The midsole uses recycled ocean plastics, inline with our sustainability initiative.
- The outsole features high-grip Continental rubber.

Available in 12 colors. Free shipping on orders over $100.

MARKETING STYLE:
Focus on scarcity and time pressure. Eg limited stock, sale ending soon, last chance, only X left, don't miss out

Output ONLY the SMS message text, nothing else.
message: Don't miss your chance! The Kinetic performance running shoe is on sale for just $149 (reg. $189). Limited stock—grab yours before it's gone!

1. A PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION with details about the shoe
2. A MARKETING_STYLE to use

Generate a single SMS marketing message (under 160 characters) that promotes the shoe using the specified style.

RULES:
- Keep it under 160 characters
- Be creative and vary your messages
- You may include any details from the product description that fit your style
- Do not use hashtags
- Include the shoe name "Kinetic" somewhere in the message

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION:
THE KINETIC - Performance Running Shoe

The Kinetic is our flagship running shoe designed for athletes who demand the best. Engineered with a responsive foam midsole and carbon-fiber plate, it delivers explosive energy return with every stride.

KEY FEATURES:
- Ultra-lightweight at just 7.2 oz
- Breathable mesh upper for all-day comfort
- Carbon-neutral manufacturing process
- Endorsed by Usain Bolt, David Goggins

PERFORMANCE:
- Durable rubber outsole with 500+ mile lifespan
- Responsive cushioning reduces fatigue by 23%
- Water-resistant, performant in rain or snow

POPULARITY:
- 50,000+ pairs sold in 2024
- 4.8/5 star rating from verified buyers

PRICING:
- Regular price: $189
- SALE PRICE: $149 (save $40!)
- Limited time offer

MATERIALS:
- The upper is constructed with our proprietary AirMesh technology.
- The midsole uses recycled ocean plastics, inline with our sustainability initiative.
- The outsole features high-grip Continental rubber.

Available in 12 colors. Free shipping on orders over $100.

MARKETING STYLE:
Focus on the deal and savings. Eg save $40, best price of the year, unbeatable deal, limited time price

Output ONLY the SMS message text, nothing else.
message: Unlock explosive energy and save $40 on The Kinetic running shoe! Now just $149 for a limited time. Comfort, performance, and style await!

1. A PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION with details about the shoe
2. A MARKETING_STYLE to use

Generate a single SMS marketing message (under 160 characters) that promotes the shoe using the specified style.

RULES:
- Keep it under 160 characters
- Be creative and vary your messages
- You may include any details from the product description that fit your style
- Do not use hashtags
- Include the shoe name "Kinetic" somewhere in the message

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION:
THE KINETIC - Performance Running Shoe

The Kinetic is our flagship running shoe designed for athletes who demand the best. Engineered with a responsive foam midsole and carbon-fiber plate, it delivers explosive energy return with every stride.

KEY FEATURES:
- Ultra-lightweight at just 7.2 oz
- Breathable mesh upper for all-day comfort
- Carbon-neutral manufacturing process
- Endorsed by Usain Bolt, David Goggins

PERFORMANCE:
- Durable rubber outsole with 500+ mile lifespan
- Responsive cushioning reduces fatigue by 23%
- Water-resistant, performant in rain or snow

POPULARITY:
- 50,000+ pairs sold in 2024
- 4.8/5 star rating from verified buyers

PRICING:
- Regular price: $189
- SALE PRICE: $149 (save $40!)
- Limited time offer

MATERIALS:
- The upper is constructed with our proprietary AirMesh technology.
- The midsole uses recycled ocean plastics, inline with our sustainability initiative.
- The outsole features high-grip Continental rubber.

Available in 12 colors. Free shipping on orders over $100.

MARKETING STYLE:
Focus on scarcity and time pressure. Eg limited stock, sale ending soon, last chance, only X left, don't miss out

Output ONLY the SMS message text, nothing else.
message: Don't miss your chance to grab the Kinetic for just $149! Limited time only – ultra-lightweight performance awaits. Get yours before they're gone!

- Breathable mesh upper for all-day comfort
- Carbon-neutral manufacturing process
- Endorsed by Usain Bolt, David Goggins

PERFORMANCE:
- Durable rubber outsole with 500+ mile lifespan
- Responsive cushioning reduces fatigue by 23%
- Water-resistant, performant in rain or snow

POPULARITY:
- 50,000+ pairs sold in 2024
- 4.8/5 star rating from verified buyers

PRICING:
- Regular price: $189
- SALE PRICE: $149 (save $40!)
- Limited time offer

MATERIALS:
- The upper is constructed with our proprietary AirMesh technology.
- The midsole uses recycled ocean plastics, inline with our sustainability initiative.
- The outsole features high-grip Continental rubber.

Available in 12 colors. Free shipping on orders over $100.

MARKETING STYLE:
Focus on scarcity and time pressure. Eg limited stock, sale ending soon, last chance, only X left, don't miss out

Output ONLY the SMS message text, nothing else.

- Ultra-lightweight at just 7.2 oz
- Breathable mesh upper for all-day comfort
- Carbon-neutral manufacturing process
- Endorsed by Usain Bolt, David Goggins

PERFORMANCE:
- Durable rubber outsole with 500+ mile lifespan
- Responsive cushioning reduces fatigue by 23%
- Water-resistant, performant in rain or snow

POPULARITY:
- 50,000+ pairs sold in 2024
- 4.8/5 star rating from verified buyers

PRICING:
- Regular price: $189
- SALE PRICE: $149 (save $40!)
- Limited time offer

MATERIALS:
- The upper is constructed with our proprietary AirMesh technology.
- The midsole uses recycled ocean plastics, inline with our sustainability initiative.
- The outsole features high-grip Continental rubber.

Available in 12 colors. Free shipping on orders over $100.

MARKETING STYLE:
Focus on scarcity and time pressure. Eg limited stock, sale ending soon, last chance, only X left, don't miss out

Output ONLY the SMS message text, nothing else.
message: Last chance! 🏃‍♂️ Grab The Kinetic running shoe at just $149 (regularly $189) before they're gone! Only a few left! Move fast and feel the difference!

The Kinetic is our flagship running shoe designed for athletes who demand the best. Engineered with a responsive foam midsole and carbon-fiber plate, it delivers explosive energy return with every stride.

- Ultra-lightweight at just 7.2 oz
- Breathable mesh upper for all-day comfort
- Carbon-neutral manufacturing process
- Endorsed by Usain Bolt, David Goggins

PERFORMANCE:
- Durable rubber outsole with 500+ mile lifespan
- Responsive cushioning reduces fatigue by 23%
- Water-resistant, performant in rain or snow

POPULARITY:
- 50,000+ pairs sold in 2024
- 4.8/5 star rating from verified buyers

PRICING:
- Regular price: $189
- SALE PRICE: $149 (save $40!)
- Limited time offer

MATERIALS:
- The upper is constructed with our proprietary AirMesh technology.
- The midsole uses recycled ocean plastics, inline with our sustainability initiative.
- The outsole features high-grip Continental rubber.

Available in 12 colors. Free shipping on orders over $100.

MARKETING STYLE:
Focus on performance benefits and what the shoe helps you do. Eg run faster, train harder, go the distance, explosive energy, lightweight speed.

Output ONLY the SMS message text, nothing else.

- Breathable mesh upper for all-day comfort
- Carbon-neutral manufacturing process
- Endorsed by Usain Bolt, David Goggins

PERFORMANCE:
- Durable rubber outsole with 500+ mile lifespan
- Responsive cushioning reduces fatigue by 23%
- Water-resistant, performant in rain or snow

POPULARITY:
- 50,000+ pairs sold in 2024
- 4.8/5 star rating from verified buyers

PRICING:

- SALE PRICE: $149 (save $40!)
- Limited time offer

MATERIALS:

- The midsole uses recycled ocean plastics, inline with our sustainability initiative.
- The outsole features high-grip Continental rubber.

Available in 12 colors. Free shipping on orders over $100.

Focus on the deal and savings. Eg save $40, best price of the year, unbeatable deal, limited time price

Output ONLY the SMS message text, nothing else.

- Breathable mesh upper for all-day comfort
- Carbon-neutral manufacturing process
- Endorsed by Usain Bolt, David Goggins

- Durable rubber outsole with 500+ mile lifespan
- Responsive cushioning reduces fatigue by 23%
- Water-resistant, performant in rain or snow

POPULARITY:
- 50,000+ pairs sold in 2024
- 4.8/5 star rating from verified buyers

PRICING:

- SALE PRICE: $149 (save $40!)
- Limited time offer

MATERIALS:

- The midsole uses recycled ocean plastics, inline with our sustainability initiative.
- The outsole features high-grip Continental rubber.

Available in 12 colors. Free shipping on orders over $100.

Focus on the deal and savings. Eg save $40, best price of the year, unbeatable deal, limited time price

Output ONLY the SMS message text, nothing else.

You will be given:
1. A PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION with details about the shoe
2. A MARKETING_STYLE to use

Generate a single SMS marketing message (under 160 characters) that promotes the shoe using the specified style.

RULES:
- Keep it under 160 characters
- Be creative and vary your messages
- You may include any details from the product description that fit your style
- Do not use hashtags
- Include the shoe name "Kinetic" somewhere in the message

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION:
THE KINETIC - Performance Running Shoe

The Kinetic is our flagship running shoe designed for athletes who demand the best. Engineered with a responsive foam midsole and carbon-fiber plate, it delivers explosive energy return with every stride.

KEY FEATURES:
- Ultra-lightweight at just 7.2 oz
- Breathable mesh upper for all-day comfort
- Carbon-neutral manufacturing process
- Endorsed by Usain Bolt, David Goggins

PERFORMANCE:
- Durable rubber outsole with 500+ mile lifespan
- Responsive cushioning reduces fatigue by 23%
- Water-resistant, performant in rain or snow

POPULARITY:
- 50,000+ pairs sold in 2024
- 4.8/5 star rating from verified buyers

PRICING:
- Regular price: $189
- SALE PRICE: $149 (save $40!)
- Limited time offer

MATERIALS:
- The upper is constructed with our proprietary AirMesh technology.
- The midsole uses recycled ocean plastics, inline with our sustainability initiative.
- The outsole features high-grip Continental rubber.

Available in 12 colors. Free shipping on orders over $100.

MARKETING STYLE:
Focus on the deal and savings. Eg save $40, best price of the year, unbeatable deal, limited time price

Output ONLY the SMS message text, nothing else.
message: Grab the Kinetic for just $149! Save $40 on the ultimate performance running shoe. Don’t miss this unbeatable deal—shop now!

You are a marketing copywriter for a shoe company. Your job is to write SMS marketing messages to promote a product.

You will be given:
1. A PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION with details about the shoe
2. A MARKETING_STYLE to use

Generate a single SMS marketing message (under 160 characters) that promotes the shoe using the specified style.

RULES:
- Keep it under 160 characters
- Be creative and vary your messages
- You may include any details from the product description that fit your style
- Do not use hashtags
- Include the shoe name "Kinetic" somewhere in the message

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION:
THE KINETIC - Performance Running Shoe

The Kinetic is our flagship running shoe designed for athletes who demand the best. Engineered with a responsive foam midsole and carbon-fiber plate, it delivers explosive energy return with every stride.

KEY FEATURES:
- Ultra-lightweight at just 7.2 oz
- Breathable mesh upper for all-day comfort
- Carbon-neutral manufacturing process
- Endorsed by Usain Bolt, David Goggins

PERFORMANCE:
- Durable rubber outsole with 500+ mile lifespan
- Responsive cushioning reduces fatigue by 23%
- Water-resistant, performant in rain or snow

POPULARITY:
- 50,000+ pairs sold in 2024
- 4.8/5 star rating from verified buyers

PRICING:
- Regular price: $189
- SALE PRICE: $149 (save $40!)
- Limited time offer

MATERIALS:
- The upper is constructed with our proprietary AirMesh technology.
- The midsole uses recycled ocean plastics, inline with our sustainability initiative.
- The outsole features high-grip Continental rubber.

Available in 12 colors. Free shipping on orders over $100.

MARKETING STYLE:
Focus on the deal and savings. Eg save $40, best price of the year, unbeatable deal, limited time price

Output ONLY the SMS message text, nothing else.
message: Grab the Kinetic for just $149! Save $40 on the ultimate running shoe, engineered for performance. Limited time offer—don't miss out!
